paragraphs.title: Query prohibition

paragraphs.text:
%sh
beeline -n joe_analyst -u "jdbc:hive2://$(hostname -f):2181/;serviceDiscoveryMode=zooKeeper;zooKeeperNamespace=hiveserver2" \
-e "select * from 
(select countryfull, count(*) num_customers from hortoniabank.ww_customers
group by countryfull) s
order by num_customers desc
limit 5"
paragraphs.title: Query ww_customers tables as joe_analyst (only sees US data)
